summary: Farison Padavil, a Radiographer, was initially disciplined for fraudulently obtaining his license and making false reports by failing to disclose criminal convictions. He subsequently violated a consent order by not signing necessary release forms for the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program (MPRP). As a result, his license was immediately suspended until he fully complies with MPRP enrollment, followed by two years of probation and an additional $1,000 fine.
